alert.note: Alert for Kanabec; Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:30PM CDT until July 12 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... East central Mille Lacs County in east central Minnesota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Onamia, or 25 miles south of Mille Lacs Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bock around 550 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ogilvie, Mora and Brunswick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
